docs.title: Python 3.14
docs.description: Comprehensive learning guide and reference for Python 3.14. Covers beginner fundamentals through advanced topics like concurrency, typing, and performance.

docs.title: CustomTkinter
docs.description: Modern, fully customizable Python desktop UI library built on top of Tkinter. Create beautiful apps with light/dark mode, high-DPI scaling, and consistent cross-platform appearance.

docs.title: ReportLab
docs.description: The powerful open-source PDF generation library for Python. Create complex, data-driven PDF documents with tables, charts, images, barcodes, and precise page layouts.

docs.title: CSS Complete Reference & Practical Guide
docs.description: A comprehensive reference guide to CSS covering selectors, the cascade, layout, flexbox, grid, typography, transitions, animations, and responsive design.
